properties.description: Get listings for houses, apartments,  rowhouses, etc., sequentially

relativeUrl.value: @concat('properties/list-residential?LatitudeMax=', dataset().latMax, '&LatitudeMin=',dataset().latMin, '&LongitudeMax=', dataset().lngMax, '&LongitudeMin=', dataset().lngMin, '&CurrentPage=', dataset().currentPage, '&RecordsPerPage=', dataset().recordsPerPage, '&SortOrder=', dataset().sortOrder, '&SortBy=', dataset().sortBy, 'TransactionTypeId=', dataset().transactionTypeId, '&PropertySearchTypeId=', dataset().propertySearchTypeId, '&PropertyTypeGroupId=', dataset().propertyTypeGroupId, '&BuildingTypeId=', dataset().buildingTypeId)

-- -- -- Schema
-- CREATE SCHEMA ldw;


-- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE
-- create external data source raw_listings
-- with (
--     location = 'abfss://realtor@dlsprimarystorage.dfs.core.windows.net'
-- )

-- -- check auto-assigned data types
-- exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'
-- SELECT TOP 10
--     iD   
-- FROM
--     OPENROWSET(
--         BULK ''bronze/listings_2.json'',
--         data_source = ''raw_listings'',
--         FORMAT = ''CSV'',
--         FIELDQUOTE = ''0x0b'',
--         FIELDTERMINATOR =''0x0b'',
--         ROWTERMINATOR = ''0x0b''
--     )
-- WITH (
--     jsonContent varchar(MAX)
--     --JSON_VALUE(jsonContent, ''$.results[id]'') AS listing_id
-- ) AS [listings]
-- ';

-- Use /** in BULK or DATA_SOURCE to recursively load
SELECT     
    TOP 10 
    --  fullResults.filename() as file_name
    -- ,Id
    -- ,MlsNumber
    -- ,PublicRemarks
    -- CAST(JSON_VALUE(listings, '$.Id') AS bigint) listing_id,
    -- CAST(JSON_VALUE(listings, '$.MlsNumber') AS nvarchar(12)) mls_number
    listings.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'bronze/listings_2.json',
        data_source = 'raw_listings',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
WITH (
    jsonContent nvarchar(MAX)
) AS fullResults
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonContent)
WITH (
     Results NVARCHAR(MAX) as json
) AS results
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(Results)
WITH
(
    Id BIGINT,
    MlsNumber NVARCHAR(12),
    -- PublicRemarks NVARCHAR(MAX),
    Building NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON,
    Individual NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON,
    Property NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON,
    Land NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON,
    PostalCode NVARCHAR(6),
    ProvinceName NVARCHAR(30),
    StatusId NVARCHAR(3),
    InsertedDateUTC NVARCHAR(25),
    TimeOnRealtor NVARCHAR(25)
) AS listings
;

USE realtor;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'realtor')
 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE realtor
 WITH (
     location = 'abfss://realtor@dlsprimarystorage.dfs.core.windows.net'
 )
GO

-- auto-generated code
-- IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
-- 	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
-- 	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
-- GO

-- IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'realtor_dlsprimarystorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
-- 	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [realtor_dlsprimarystorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
-- 	WITH (
-- 		LOCATION = 'abfss://realtor@dlsprimarystorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
-- 	)
-- GO

-- drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE realtor_main_folder;

-- USE realtor
-- GO

-- DROP VIEW IF EXISTS ldw.vListings
-- GO
-- IF OBJECT_ID('ldw.vListings') IS NULL
  
    CREATE VIEW ldw.vListings
    AS
        SELECT
        *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'https://dlsprimarystorage.dfs.core.windows.net/realtor/raw/2023/*/*/*.parquet',
            FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
            )
        WITH (
            [ListingId] int,
            [MlsNumber] nvarchar(20),
            [PublicRemarks] nvarchar(4000),
            [BathroomTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [Bedrooms] nvarchar(100),
            [SizeInterior] nvarchar(100),
            [StoriesTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [BuildingType] nvarchar(100),
            [Price] nvarchar(100),
            [PropertyType] nvarchar(100),
            [AddressText] nvarchar(300),
            [Longitude] float,
            [Latitude] float,
            [ParkingSpaceTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [TypeId] int,
            [OwnershipType] nvarchar(100),
            [AmmenitiesNearBy] nvarchar(500),
            [ConvertedPrice] nvarchar(100),
            [ParkingType] nvarchar(100),
            [PriceUnformattedValue] float,
            [SizeTotal] nvarchar(100),
            [SizeFrontage] nvarchar(100),
            [PostalCode] nvarchar(10),
            [ProvinceName] nvarchar(50),
            [RelativeDetailsURLSlug] nvarchar(300),
            [ListingStatusId] int,
            [RelativeURLEn] nvarchar(300),
            [RelativeURLFr] nvarchar(300),
            [ListingInsertedDateUTC] bigint,
            [TimeOnRealtor] nvarchar(100)            
        ) AS listings;

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ldw.vListings;

 exec sp_describe_first_result_set N'
    SELECT
        TOP 10 *
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK ''https://dlsprimarystorage.dfs.core.windows.net/realtor/raw/2023/05*/*.parquet'',
            FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
        ) AS [result]
'
